dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Guh!  You’re strong, but I’m not done yet!

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Just stop it already!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: No!  You didn’t show mercy to Mr. Fluffy!  This is payback!

dialogue.Speaker: Delilah
dialogue.Text: Yes, we did.

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: Dude, Mr. Fluffy is fine.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Like that’ll sway - wait, what?

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: We didn’t even touch Mr. Fluffy.  What the hell.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Well fine, but what about the others?!

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Like, how were we supposed to save all of them?

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: They were slaughtering people!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Just like you slaughtered them!

dialogue.Speaker: Kitty
dialogue.Text: We didn’t ‘slaughter’ Mr. Fluffy.

dialogue.Speaker: Kitty
dialogue.Text: Don’t you think you might be jumping to conclusions here?

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: You just said you didn’t save them all!

dialogue.Speaker: Delilah
dialogue.Text: Of course not.

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Look, Milo.  We saved as many as we could, okay?  But we couldn’t ignore the people in trouble either.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: I -

dialogue.Speaker: Dr. G
dialogue.Text: Milo, let’s put a stop to this before anyone else is hurt - monster or otherwise.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: No, they’re depending on me!  There’s nothing to stop you from saying that and then mistreating them again!

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Sure there is. You will.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Yeah, you’re right. Let’s go home.
